verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: cancels] [ARG1: the event] , yet the first tweets still have a ‘ substitute’ event at the same time with patriotic music . So the event is canceled and the substitute event will have undoubtedly some remarks probably framed as that failed football ...
